00027     ~PhaseModel() {
00028       set<CahnHilliard *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00029       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00030     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00031     
00032       for (set<CahnHilliard *>::iterator it = UNIQUEmaterials.begin();
00033        it != UNIQUEmaterials.end(); it++) 
00034         delete (*it);
00035     };

00040     // From constant value
00041     void initializeField(const Real value) {
00042       const uint numNodes = _myMesh->getNumberOfNodes();
00043       const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00044       // Case: Only scalar field DOF
00045       for (uint i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) 
00046     _field[i] = value;       
00047     };
00048 
00050     void initializeField(const Real* value) {
00051       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());
00052     };
00053 
00054 
00055 
00057     void linearizedUpdate(const Real* localValues, Real fact) {
00058       const int nLocalDof = (_myMesh->getNumberOfNodes())*_nodeDoF;
00059       for(uint i = 0; i < nLocalDof; i++)
00060     _field[i] += fact*localValues[i];
00061     };
00062 
00063     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00064     void linearizedUpdate(const int id, const int dof, const Real value) {
00065       const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00066       // assert( id < _field.size() && dof < dim );
00067       _field[id*dim + dof] += value;
00068     }
00069 
00070     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00071     void linearizedUpdate(const int dof, const Real value) {
00072       _field[dof] += value;
00073     }
00074     
00075     void setField(uint dof, Real value) {
00076       _field[dof] = value;
00077     }
00078     void setField(const Real* value) {
00079       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());
00080     };
00081 
00082     void getField(vector<double> & x) {
00083       assert(x.size() == _field.size());
00084       x = _field;
00085     }

00091     void printField() {
00092       int i = 0;
00093       while (i < _field.size()) {
00094     cout << _field[i] << endl;
00095     i ++;
00096       }
00097     }

00099     void writeField(string FileName) {
00100       ofstream out;
00101       out.open( FileName.c_str() );
00102       out << _field.size() << endl;
00103       for (uint i = 0; i < _field.size(); i++) {
00104     out << setprecision(15) << _field[i] << endl;
00105       }
00106       out.close();
00107     }

00112         UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
